**Gauntlets of protection** are a type of [magical](/wiki/Magical_item "Magical item") [gloves](/wiki/Gloves "Gloves") that appear in [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack") and [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"). Their base [object material](/wiki/Object_material "Object material") is [cloth](/wiki/Cloth "Cloth"), and they have a [randomized appearance](/wiki/Randomized_appearance "Randomized appearance"); the default one associated with them is a pair of boxing gloves.

## Generation

[Giant](/wiki/Giant_\(starting_race\) "Giant (starting race)") [Infidels](/wiki/Infidel "Infidel") start the game with [cursed](/wiki/Cursed "Cursed") [fireproof](/wiki/Fireproof "Fireproof") +0 gauntlets of protection, roughly equivalent to the role's standard [cloak of protection](/wiki/Cloak_of_protection "Cloak of protection").

The [Sokoban](/wiki/Sokoban "Sokoban") prize armor has a 1⁄2 chance of being a pair of gauntlets of protection.

[Giant](/wiki/Racial_monster "Racial monster") [aligned priests](/wiki/Aligned_priest "Aligned priest") have a 2⁄21 chance of generating with gauntlets of protection in place of the standard cloak of protection. Giant [Infidel](/index.php?title=Infidel_\(player_monster\)\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Infidel (player monster) (page does not exist)") [player monsters](/wiki/Player_monster "Player monster") will generate with gauntlets of protection, and other player monsters created at level 20 or higher, including giants, may generate with gauntlets of protection.

## Description

When worn, gauntlets of protection grant a +2 AC bonus and [MC3](/wiki/Magic_cancellation "Magic cancellation") in addition to their material's AC adjustment;

## Strategy

One primary use of the gauntlets of protection is to provide a reliable source of MC3 for giants and tortles, whose bodies are too large to wear a cloak of protection. Non-illithid players using a source of [reflection](/wiki/Reflection "Reflection") besdies [Dragonbane](/wiki/Dragonbane#EvilHack "Dragonbane") and/or forgoing [gauntlets of power](/wiki/Gauntlets_of_power "Gauntlets of power") can use these gloves to maximize protection and keep the [cloak](/wiki/Cloak "Cloak") slot open, e.g. for a [robe](/wiki/Robe "Robe") or [cloak of magic resistance](/wiki/Cloak_of_magic_resistance "Cloak of magic resistance").
